original_title: Die Akte Tschaikowsky â€“ Bekenntnisse eines Komponisten
overview: The film brings Peter Tchaikovsky in a radical way into the present and draws an emotionally charged psychogram of the most famous composer of Russia. Tchaikovsky's fate of being a homosexual at the mercy of gay men moves into close proximity. In addition, well-known international artists and experts appear in the film and reveal their very personal approach to Tchaikovsky and his music.
title: The Tchaikovsky Files - Confessions of a Composer
